intro_description: I structure and develop complete web systems, going through the database, back end and front end
about_me_p1: My taste for video games started my curiosity about programming, which has become a passion since I wrote my first code more than 5 years ago.
about_me_p2: Always looking to learn more every day, to be able to develop better and better systems that can help people even more
about_me_p3: Everything is better when you work with what you love.
contact_desc: Got interested in my work? Let's talk! Send me an e-mail with your ideas.
